definition_en: the unique numerical identity of a person over time
combination of first, middle and last name

synonyms_en: birth name,     born name,     name at birth

definition_en: Rounded difference of current date and birth date in years.
The date when a person was born.
The place where a person was born.
The date when a person died.
The place where a person has died.
A person with an age above 18.
A person with an age below 18.
A person who has at least one child.
